title: Essa Al-Zenkawi
text: Essa Mohammed Gharib Al-Zenkawi (born 17 October 1992) is a <a href="Kuwait">Kuwait</a>i/<a href="Hungarians">Hungarian</a> athlete in Kuwait’s national <a href="Sport%20of%20athletics">Athletics</a> team specializing in <a href="Discus%20throw">Discus throw</a>. He competed at the <a href="2015%20World%20Championships%20in%20Athletics">2015 World Championships</a> in Beijing without qualifying for the final. He won a silver medal at the 2015 Asian Championships and a bronze at the 2018 Asian Games, where he served as the flag bearer for Kuwait at the opening ceremony.
